titles.title: A concurrent resolution honoring the distinguished service of the pioneers of supersonic aerial flight, as exemplified by Air Force Brigadier General Charles E. "Chuck" Yeager's many years of distinguished United States service, on the 40th anniversary of his becoming the first man to fly an airplane faster than the speed of sound.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 10/14/1987--Introduced. Honors the service of the pioneers of supersonic flight, as exemplified by Air Force Brigadier General Charles E. "Chuck" Yeager, on the 40th anniversary of his becoming the first man to fly an airplane faster than the speed of sound.
